price: ߐ߲߬ߤߐ߲߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ ߟߋ߬ ߘߊ߲ ߞߊ߫ ߜߍ߬ߟߍ߲߫ ߓߊ߬ ߥߟߊ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߸ ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߵߏ ߟߐ߬
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: a-antum ashaddu khalqan ami al-samāu banāhā
